metadata.dc:title: Concerning supervision
metadata.dc:description: The author reflects on supervision, focusing on the specific space established by the situation of supervision: the role and function of the supervising analyst and the different registers of listening that take place in it. She considers that this situation generates a specific function of the supervisor that may be defined somewhere between transmission of knowledge and analysis. There is an effort to help candidates to find their own model of understanding of unconscious language. The author also points out that the supervisor prioritizes the training analyst´s listening to the patient as well as the latter´s conscious or unconscious response to the supervisor´s interventions (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Rodríguez Parodi, María Elena
metadata.dc:title: Acerca de la supervisión
